synopsis.text: Such an ordinary day turns into an extraordinary adventure for high school student Ken Usato, as he finds himself transported to a fantastical realm alongside two of his accomplished classmates. The Llinger Kingdom, teetering on the brink of invasion by the Demon Lord's army, mistakenly identifies the trio as the prophesied heroes. However, Usato discovers that he possesses a unique gift for healing magic, an extremely rare talent that piques the interest of the formidable Rescue Team captain, Rose. Forced into rigorous training under Rose's watchful eye, Usato strives to harness his newfound abilities and become a formidable healer, determined to protect his friends and prove his worth in this perilous new world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
